headline: BlueScope Steel Open to Better Offers After Spurning $8.8 Billion Takeover Bid
summary: BlueScope Steel isn’t in talks with suitors Steel Dynamics and SGH but would be open to a takeover proposal that meets its expectations, the company’s new chief executive officer said in an interview.
